### RefNum Preparation

```{r echo=TRUE}
# Convert to factor check for uniqueness 
data$RefNum = as.factor(data$RefNum)  
str(data$RefNum)

levels <- nlevels(data$RefNum)  
rows <- length(data$RefNum)  

# If the factor count matches the rows 
if(levels == rows) {   
  print("All RefNums Unique") 
}
```
